org.joo.steak.framework.config

Interface StateEngineConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStateEngineConfiguration

    public interface StateEngineConfiguration
    Interface for state engine configuration It will be used by StateManager to load the desired State and StateTransition
    Author:
    griever

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getStatesConfig()
      Get the state configurations.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]>> getTransitionsConfig()
      Get the transition configurations.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatesConfig

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getStatesConfig()
        Get the state configurations. This is a map from state name to state configuration object. The configuration object can be String or a State instance. This loaded by StateEngineLoader
        Returns:
        the state configurations

      • getTransitionsConfig

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]>> getTransitionsConfig()
        Get the transition configurations. This is a 2-level map from state name to state transitions. The second level map key indicates the action that triggers the state change. And the value indicates a transition list. Usually if the transition is string, it will be converted to SimpleStateTransition
        Returns:
